body:
Yo peeps and homies,

On this day, two years ago, I joined this server for the first time, it was the first server i ever connected to.  And i was one clueless idiot.  Now ive a done a little bit of everything, I almost prestiged in Elimination (ALMOST), Some meanie got me banned :,(, got unbanned,  I played alot of walls, I started a minecraft Youtube channel, I applied for ref and then realized I referee soccer games on saturdays so i would miss every tournament game XD.  I've made a few maps, I applied for Mod, backed out, then applied again and got Junior :3  Now here i am, its been 2 years.  Crazy.

So AMA you people of the Avicus Community.

~Random_Pet/Nub/Guy
body_tagged:

So AMA you people of the Avicus Community.

~Random_Pet/Nub/Guy
title: Random's AMA [Two years on AV]

replies.body: Where do you live? What is your name? Favourite food? Favourite fruit? Favourite drink? Favourite colour? Favourite animal? How did you find Avicus?
replies.body_tagged: Where do you live? What is your name? Favourite food? Favourite fruit? Favourite drink? Favourite colour? Favourite animal? How did you find Avicus?

replies.body:
I live in the United States, Virginia for the win.

Mah name is Mark

Favorite food: nothing beats some nice juicy medium rare steak

Favorite fruit: I'm a picky eater, don't like much fruit XD

Favorite drink: sparkling grape juice is Love

Favorite color: Blueeeeee

Favorite animal: never really thought about it, owls are pretty cool.

How did you find avicus: we just got internet that didn't limit us to 10gigs a month, so I decided to try online minecraft. I looked up how to play walls online, the video told me to connect to wallsmc, so I did and boom, I was on avicus

replies.body:
@Acceptancq

Favorite flavor of paper: well......i guess regular printing paper.....not much for the new crazy cherry flavored paper that the kids want these days.....

Favorite school subject: probably history, cuz it bores me the least lol

Best memory of avicus: shoot......well todays scrim was pretty great.....lot of laughing.....also the time i enderpearled straight into a lava pit in a walls game, funny as crap lol

chocolate water, because chocolate makes everything better

@Sayah

Didnt really know you until we scrimmed today, you seem nice, ill have a stronger opinion once we interact some more >:D

sandpaper as toilet paper........sounds slightly less bad lol

erm, i dont have it, but the white girl texture pack is pretty genius..

Ehhh Not really, but i have no reason not to go either, but of course its across the ocean XD

Actually I didnt get demoted, i resigned, i dont have alot of time on my hands so when i get on minecraft, i wanna just chill, you get me? :P
